speaker.whotheyare: Dorie Clark believes in the power of long-term thinking – and works to help people and companies do more of it.
speaker.whylisten:
Dorie Clark teaches for Duke University’s Fuqua School of Business and Columbia Business School. She is the author of The Long Game, Entrepreneurial You, Reinventing You and Stand Out.

A former presidential campaign spokeswoman, Clark is a frequent contributor to the Harvard Business Review and the Wall Street Journal, and consults and speaks for clients such as Google, Yale University and the World Bank.

She is a graduate of Harvard Divinity School, a producer of a multiple Grammy-winning jazz album and a musical theater writer.

You can download her free Long Game Strategic Thinking Self-Assessment .
